metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1876 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 102.0.5005.61allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
